title: The World of Ginger Fox
description: Collectible Condition. Clean, bright white pages, no marks, tears, smudges, or highlights. Strong, sturdy binding. Minimal shelf wear, Mylar cover over original dust jacket. Signed by Author and Illustrator, limited signed edition; #124 of 1200. This is a beautiful book, the illustrations capture the spirit of the 1980s
author: Mike Baron
